item.description:
Dance to the 18-piece Beantown Swing Orchestra, with special guests artists Eden MacAdam-Somer on violin and Larry Unger on guitar, who will also perform their own music during the band's break.

Learn basic Lindy Hop moves from dance instructors Elizabeth and Matthew Miller.

Learn a backflip if you are up for it.

See some Lindy Hop and Charleston dance demos from local competition groups.

Check out www.beantownswing.com/csh2-2-08_ann.html for the exciting details!
item.how_to_find_us: Elizabeth will be teaching the beginner swing lesson; Frank will be on stage conducting the band.

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Swing Dance in Concord, Mass.
